title: will pay for ride to universal fibers (abingdon va-bristol va)
shortDescription: i am seeking transportation to and from work at universal fibers in bristol va. i live in central abingdon va. i am willing to pay a reasonable amount for reliable transportation. if you are interested, feel free to contact me @ 2 7 6 2 7 4 2 3 3 3
